official_title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee to attend memorial services for the Honorable Nick Begich.

summary.text: Authorizes the Speaker to appoint a committee of the House, together with such Members of the Senate as may be joined, to attend memorial services to be held for the Honorable Nick Begich in Anchorage, Alaska, on January 7, 1973. Directs the Sergeant at Arms of the House to take such steps as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of these resolutions and that the necessary expenses in connection therewith be paid out of the contingent fund of the House.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee to attend memorial services for the Honorable Nick Begich.
